item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1344; 06:05PM; 6732 S Brynhurst Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nQjWaq; Hyde Park; KNOCKDOWN: 20 firefighters extinguished the fire in 10 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to the unit of origin. The primary and secondary searches found no occupants. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E15 E266 E66 RA266 RA57 RA866 SQ21 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1344; 05:55PM; 6732 S Brynhurst Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nQjWaq; Hyde Park; One story, garden style apartment building with fire showing from one unit. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E15 E266 E66 RA57 SQ21 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0871; 01:42PM; 1446 E 20th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Izb01b; Central-Alameda; KNOCKDOWN: 62 firefighters extinguished the fire in 32 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire originated in one converted, single story garage and extended to a second, exposed similar structure. Crews were in the offensive mode on both buildings and prevented the fire from damaging any of the additional exposed buildings. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 BC5 CM22 E14 E17 E2 E202 E203 E209 E210 E221 E233 E27 E4 E9 EM1 HR3 RA14 RA17 RA803 RA810 SQ21 T10 T2 T21 T3 T33 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 15; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0871; 01:30PM; 1446 E 20th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Izb01b; Central-Alameda; The fire extended into the attic and has impinged on another structure. The primary searches on both structures finds no occupants. Additional resources requested and are enroute ; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 BC5 CM22 E14 E17 E2 E202 E203 E209 E210 E233 E27 E4 E9 EM1 HR3 RA14 RA17 RA803 SQ21 T10 T2 T3 T33 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0871; 01:10PM; 1446 E 20th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Izb01b; Central-Alameda; A back house (at a one story, single family dwelling) with fire showing. Hiker Rescue; INC#0622; 11:01AM; 18602 Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qQJtSy; Tarzana; LAFD Air Ops located a 48yo male mountain biker who sustained a fall with injuries (non-life threatening). Due to the location/terrain and injuries, a hoist operation with transport is underway. The 9-1-1 call was received at 10:34AM. No further details.; FS 109; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 11; BC10 BP109 BP19 BP99 E109 E293 H2 HA2 RA84 RH214 T93; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue; INC#0530; 09:47AM; 16601 Via Pacifica; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Kzup3K; Pacific Palisades; LAFD Air Ops will conduct a hoist rescue and transport for a 26yo female hiker who sustained an approximately 10' fall with injuries. The 9-1-1 call was received at 9:23AM. No further details.; FS 23; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E23 E269 H1 H2 HA1 HA2 RA23 RH114 T69; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1953; 11:34PM; 8845 N Morehart Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3g3QvNX; Sun Valley; In 18 minutes, 26 firefighters extinguished fire in a one story, single family dwelling. Both the primary and secondary search found no occupants. No injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 11:16PM. No further details. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC14 E289 E298 E77 E89 RA889 RA89 T89 T98; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

Auto vs Motorcycle - FATALITY; INC#0860; 01:14PM; 22800 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IoPg84; West Hills; An auto versus motorcycle collision has left one person determined dead on scene (age/gender unknown at this time) and two additional patients with undetermined injuries. Media questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Topanga Division Inc# 2166. No further details; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; E106 E305 RA72 T105; CH8; Margaret Stewart

Vehicle into Building; INC#0425; 09:54AM; 5348 N Topanga Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FOdUx7; Woodland Hills; At 8:46AM the LAFD responded to a reported vehicle into building. A single car went into a wall (off the parking lot) of a veterinary clinic. Three patients were transported - one adult female employee who was inside the building in unknown condition, two additional patients (age/gender unknown) were transported for minor, non-life threatening injuries. LAFD Urban Search and Rescue unit evaluated the structure and did not determine any loss of structural integrity. There was no evacuation required. LA Building and Safety was notified and is the point of contact for official determination of the building status. Any further media inquires regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Inc# 1159 Topanga Division; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E305 E84 EM17 RA84 RA903 T105 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart
